name: Conway's Game of Life
description: Understanding how Conway's game of life and other cellular automata work
content:
## Game of life algorithm The game of life takes place in an infinite two dimensional grid of cells. However in this implementation the grid is finite. A cell can be alive or dead which can also be called populated and unpopulated. every cell relates to 8 of it's direct neighbors.

### Rules: - if the cell is alive and has < 2 live neighbors it dies - if the cell is alive and has exactly 2 or 3 live neighbors it lives - if the cell is alive and has more than 3 neighbors it dies - if the cell is dead and has exactly 3 neighbors it becomes alive
